Pixel effects are not programmed in Lua, but by using a special effect language instead. The effect language is basically GLSL 1.20 (specs) with a few aliases added for existing types:
trans-unit.target: 像素效果不是在Lua中编程的，而是通过使用特殊效果语言来编写的。效果语言基本上是GLSL 1.20（specs），并为现有类型添加了一些别名：

trans-unit.source: Pixel effects are not programmed in Lua, but by using a special effect language instead. The effect language is basically GLSL 1.20 (specs) with a few aliases added for existing types:
Pixel formats for Textures, ImageData, and CompressedImageData.

Pixel shader code is run for every pixel on the screen that a drawn object touches, and is used to produce the color that will be blended onto the screen at that pixel, often by reading from an image. Pixel shaders are sometimes called fragment shaders.
trans-unit.target: 像素着色器代码是针对屏幕上绘制对象所接触的每一个像素而运行的,并用于产生将在该像素上混合到屏幕上的颜色,通常是通过读取图像来实现的。像素着色器有时也被称为片段着色器。

trans-unit.source: Pixel shader code must contain at least one function, named effect, which is the function that will produce the color which is blended onto the screen for each pixel a drawn object touches.
trans-unit.target: 像素着色器代码必须至少包含一个名为 effect 的函数，该函数将为绘制对象触摸的每个像素生成混合到屏幕上的颜色。

Polygons inherit a radius from Shape. The radius creates a skin around the polygon. The skin is used in stacking scenarios to keep polygons slightly separated. This allows continuous collision to work against the core polygon.

Pump events into the event queue.

Pump events into the event queue. This is a low-level function, and is usually not called by the user, but by love.run. Note that this does need to be called for any OS to think you're still running, and if you want to handle OS-generated events at all (think callbacks).
trans-unit.target: 将事件泵入事件队列。这是一个低级函数，通常不是由用户调用，而是由 love.run 调用。请注意，对于任何操作系统，都必须调用此方法以使其仍在运行，并且如果您想处理所有操作系统生成的事件（请考虑回调）。

trans-unit.source: Scancode

Scancodes are keyboard layout-independent, so the scancode "w" will be generated if the key in the same place as the "w" key on an American QWERTY keyboard is pressed, no matter what the key is labelled or what the user's operating system settings are.
trans-unit.target: 扫描码与键盘布局无关，因此，如果按下与美国QWERTY键盘上的“ w”键位于同一位置的键，则无论键名如何或用户的操作系统如何，都将生成扫描码“ w” 设置是。

trans-unit.source: Scancodes are useful for creating default controls that have the same physical locations on on all systems.
trans-unit.target: 扫描码对于创建在所有系统上具有相同物理位置的默认控件非常有用。

trans-unit.source: See http://luajit.org/ext_ffi_api.html for more information.

See love.window.getDPIScale. Allows the window's backbuffer to use the full pixel density of high-DPI displays on supported operating systems. LOVE will automatically scale things accordingly and use DPI-scaled units instead of pixels for most things (since 11.0) when this is true, unless the usedpiscale flag is set to false. When highdpi is false, the OS will keep things consistent between low-DPI and high-DPI displays by rendering to a low-resolution backbuffer and scaling that up on its own, when a high-DPI display is used.

See love.window.getPixelScale, love.window.toPixels, and love.window.fromPixels. It is recommended to keep this option disabled if you can't test your game on a Mac or iOS system with a Retina display, because code will need tweaking to make sure things look correct.
trans-unit.target: 请参见love.window.getPixelScale，love.window.toPixels和love.window.fromPixels。如果您无法在配备Retina显示屏的Mac或iOS系统上测试游戏，建议禁用此选项，因为代码需要进行调整以确保一切正常。
